name: Albert the Planet Catcher
description:
Albert is an old man who likes to catch planets with his butterfly net. This is a calm and simple game about catching planets made for the blackthorn prod game jam2.

Control the net using the arrow keys. Catch a planet and place it into the box. You can only hold one planet at a time. If you hit another planet while one is in the net, it will bounce out.

Thanks to javidx9 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-yuWVUplUJZvieEligKBkA) for access to his graphics engine and continuing to answer my silly questions.

All sounds from freesounds.org
